# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: Rewrite the sentences in Reported Speech

1) 'I've never heard of this artist', he said.

2) 'They're visiting us tomorrow', he said.

3) 'He'll help his friends', our teacher told us.

4) 'My parents went there two years ago', my friend added.

5)'I can't play the guitar well', explained Tom. 6) 'My friends weren't at home 3 hours ago,' she replied.

7) 'The weather's nice today,' he said.

8) 'We're having a great time here now', they said.

9) 'He is going to take part in this competition', his coach added.

Відповідь: 1) He said he had never heard of that artist. 
2) He said they were visiting them the following day. 
3) Our teacher told us he would help his friends.
4) My friend added that her parents had been there two years ago. 
5) Tom explained that he couldn't play the guitar well. 
6) She replied that her friends hadn't been at home three hours ago. 
7) He said the weather was nice that day. 
8) They said they were having a great time there then. 
9) His coach added that he was going to take part in that competition.
